column1: 27243,X-Factor (2005) #47,47,33017,66,"Time is beginning to bleed. Sentinels are starting to pop up in the darnedest places, the Summers Rebellion is spilling over into modern day, Rictor and Shatterstar have a lot to sort out, and X-Factor finally finds itself face to face with Cortex.   Rated T  ...$2.99",
